title: ‘Groupon voucher for craft beer tasting led us to a derelict car park. Was it a scam?’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I bought a Groupon voucher for beer tasting at a trendy brewery in east London called Magic Spells. It was described as a “craft beer experience with three beers and a choice of sandwich for two people”.

Unfortunately, on arrival we found the location blocked off, with no one else present in the vicinity. We called the landline number we had for them but got no reply and had no option to leave a message.

It was a wasted journey, a disappointment and £17 down the drain. My cynical side wonders if this business is all above board.

PW, London
